name: Path of Pacifism
description:
A short and sweet action adventure game, without your most trusty tool - a weapon! How will you be able to traverse the land to collect both Power Gems and unlock the castle without your sword by your side! (This game is pretty short and can be completed in about 5 minutes)

Game by Johnny Puskar - Made for GMTK Jam 2

Music by Kevin Macleod

Art by Johnny Puskar, Reddit user u/KenNL, and Ansimuz
